text: kottaikalal aran ceyyappatta urkalilo allatu matilkalukku appal iruntu konto allamal avarkal ellorum onru cerntu unkalutan porita mattarkal, avarkalukkulleye porum, pakaiyum mikak katumaiyanavai, (innilaiyil) avarkal yavarum onru pattiruppataka nir ennukirir; (anal) avarkalutaiya itayankal, citarik kitakkinrana - itarkuk karanam; meyyakave avarkal arivarra camukattar enpatutan
